This website for the 2026 Center for Social Science Innovation (CSSI) Workshop on Longitudinal Data Analysis was generated with [Quarto](https://quarto.org).
The codebase that was used to generate this website is located [here](https://github.com/isaactpetersen/ldaWorkshop-CSSI2026).

# Contact

For questions intended for Isaac Petersen, feel free to contact Isaac by email [isaac-t-petersen@uiowa.edu](mailto:isaac-t-petersen@uiowa.edu).
For questions about the Developmental Psychopathology Lab, please contact [devpsy-lab@uiowa.edu](mailto:devpsy-lab@uiowa.edu).
